Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-prt] <actionslacks> Pirate is not susceptible to 51% attacks thanks to dpow

Author: Gateway#3763

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-prt] <actionslacks> I see that Arrow arrow has a nice parallax bootstrap website, but really the only thing that matters in crypto is hash rate and the dev team. I think Pirate has an advantage in that regard. That being said, we are all in this game together and the more privacy focused projects the better.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-prt] <Domoo> Yeah

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-prt] <Domoo> Alright I dont really know tbh what is an parallax bootstrap website, but would it make sens for pirate to have one ?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-prt] <actionslacks> Bootstrap sells website templates, parallax is a website effect. While gimmicks can sell coins, this project is more focused on real usage than gimmicks.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-prt] <actionslacks> But really it comes down to devs. Zcash updates their protocol at a rapid pace. If the team behind a zcash fork is not robust, they get left in the dust :trollface:

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-prt] <mrlynch> ```The Chinese government understands that foreign companies and individuals will be reluctant to simply turn over their information to the Chinese government when asked. For that reason, the Chinese Cybersecurity Bureau does not plan to politely make a formal request for the information. The fundamental premise of the new cybersecurity systems is that the government will use its control of communications to simply take the information without discussing the matter with the user. All data will be open to the Chinese government.```

Author: Gateway#3763
Content:
[dscrd-prt] <mrlynch> biologically, a human being is a social creature and the social system is confined within communities of size no bigger than 150 - apparently that's the maximum of meaningful relationships a human being can keep
with the social media revolution humans are being "encouraged" to have more and more relationships regardless of their quality

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-prt] <mrlynch> it's the numbers that matter in the new social system. the more people like you, the better it is therefore propagating an idea becomes easier once humans accept it because it increases their chances of being liked.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-prt] <mrlynch> critical thinking and care for the immediate social community (family, neighborhood, village, etc) are detrimental in the new social system

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-prt] <mrlynch> just observe the twitter lynch mobs and you will understand what is, in reality, scary.. technology is just a tool

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-prt] <mrlynch> in conclusion, most will not risk becoming an outlaw not because of the lawlessness factor, but simply because it won't be fashionable

Author: Gateway#3763
